summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 BUICK ENCLAVE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT ABOUT 35 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED MAKING A TICKING NOISE. THE CONTACT PUT THE GEAR IN PARK AND RESTARTED THE VEHICLE AND DROVE HOME. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT A ROD IN THE MOTOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO TAKE THE VEHICLE TO A LOCAL DEALER FOR A DIAGNOSIS. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 162,000. THE VIN WAS NOT PROVIDED.
